author: waqas zamir
comment: I dont know why i bought this watchface i thought it would have features like most of the paid watchfaces now a days but the only feature it has its changin the watchface color nothing else. Disappointed!
title: Just Satisfied!

author: Seymour Gurman
comment: Normally when you spend money for an app you don't have anymore ads, sadly this is not so with this watch face.
title: Just OK is right

author: Jeffery Kresha
comment: One of my most used faces. Im Looking for a white faces version of this too if anyone knows of one.

Beautiful watch face but ridiculous permissions! This watch face shows only the time. No customization options whatever. Why does it need network, access to SD card and many more intrusive permissions? Stinks like Spyware to me! D-E-L-E-T-E-D that crap!
title: Disguised Spyware?

author: Sasha M
comment: but mostly ridiculous. when will u guys learn that we need options. we need the face to stay on for more than a second. uninstalling
title: as ridiculous as beautiful

author: Jorge Luis Pagan
comment: Ten percent of the battery was used in less than 5 minutes. It's a shame because it's a nice looking face.
title: It KILLS your battery.

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: I really like this watch face. May I suggest the option to have the date in place of the logo, and a second hand that is not sweeping. I have all of these watch face applications as they are clean and cool. I just hope that in the near future there will be more of a ladies type face in analog.
